pageContext.claim: “If you look at Canada, they've shut you out, and you see what’s happening. You look at the European Union, you can’t sell your product in there, or it’s very hard to, and they tax you, and they barrier you.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. Canada was the United States' largest goods export market in 2017, according to the Office of the U.S. Trade Representative. The U.S. and EU have the largest bilateral trade relationship in the world. The U.S. imposes tariffs or non-tariff barriers at varying rates for different products, just as other countries do.
